title: Love - Volume 1
description: Love - Volume 1 is a collection of 10 dreamy and inspiring love ambient backgrounds.
longDescription:
• Preview the collection on Youtube


Love - Volume 1 is a collection of 10 dreamy and inspiring love ambient backgrounds.

Music can define moments remaining attached to precious memories. Emotional melodies can suddenly bring smiles, love and important days back to life. With the first volume of FAM's Love you can soften your projects, thanks to soft pianos, gentle pads and atmospheric ambient elements.

These intimate and dreamy themes are particularly indicated for graphic novels and RPGs related to romance, family, home and intimate moments.

The collection features extensive loops and intros/outros for further editing.


In My Dreams: Full length (02:49), 12 Loops, Intro&Outro

Frames Of Life: Full length (01:58), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

Moments Together: Full length (01:47), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Dream Of A Lifetime: Full length (02:12), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Forever Love: Full length (02:28), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Don't Cry: Full length (02:15), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro

Northern Lights: Full length (02:00), 6 Loops, Intro&Outro

Observing Your Emotions: Full length (01:20), 4 Loops, Intro&Outro

Passage: Full length (02:10), 5 Loops, Intro&Outro

The First Time I Saw You: Full length (02:04), 7 Loops, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Peace - Vol.1

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â
technicalDetails:

10 Full length tracks

20 Intro /Outro

67 Loops

Total number of audio files: 97

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01:06:41

Supported Development Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
